testcase.classname: US1006 user should be able to login with validinfo
testcase.name: TC01 Login test with valid user name and password
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "Test_automation_Url" homepage...........................passed When User clicks on PRACTICE................................................passed And User clicks on Test Login Page..........................................passed And User clicks on UserNameBox..............................................passed And User type into username "student".......................................passed And User clicks on Password.................................................passed And User type into password "Password123"...................................passed When User clicks on SubmitButton............................................passed Then Assert that login is successful........................................passed
